_header: Who of plenty will take no heed
_description: A moralizing couplet, included in a longer series of proverbs against lending money

Banna.Transcription:
Quha in welth takis no heidHe sall haif falt in tyme of
                    neid
Banna.Note: Third occurrence in MS; immediately follows 2757 and precedes 6330.
